nodes.text: Zaglis was a male individual who held the title of Supreme Leader of the Neo-Fundamentalist Phlangites, a group active on the Expansion Region astronomical object Zaraksander. At some point between 0 ABY and 4 ABY, the bounty hunter Valken Gresh brought in Zaglis, in the process escaping from the Neo-Fundamentalist Phlangite forces in Zaraksander's Fioer desert.

The experience led Gresh to swear off facing Zaglis and his followers again, with the bounty hunter claiming such encounters did not have a sufficient profit margin. However, on the very next day, Gresh was forced to return to the Fioer desert and face the Neo-Fundamentalist Phlangites again after the hunter had been hired to rescue the kidnapped daughter of the Eloinie Petro-Munitions' Chief Executive Officer, Darred Eloinie. Gresh later mentioned the encounters with Zaglis and his followers in the autobiographical work Great Hunts I've Lived To Tell About.

Zaglis was introduced in "You Never Can Tell," a short companion narrative included in the 1994 sourcebook Galaxy Guide 10: Bounty Hunters. The book was authored by Rick D. Stuart and published by West End Games for use with Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
